pr_title: Fix treatment of star alleles in use genotype posteriors for qual mode

timeline.message: use genotype posteriors for qual spanning deletion fix

timeline.bodyText:
This can be simplified a bit.
Assuming you can write in posterior (I think is the case):
final double[] noVarPosteriors = IntStream.rangeClosed(0, ploidy)
                 .map(p, gcCalc.alleleCountsToIndex(0, p, spanIndelIdx, ploidy - p))
                 .mapToDouble(i -> posteriors[i])
                 .toArray();
return QualUtils.phredSum(noVarPosteriors) - QualUtils.phredSum(posteriors);
timeline.author: vruano

replies.bodyText: I don't know why there is a need for the Math.max(0, x) but is trivial to add it to the code above I guess.

replies.bodyText: Feel free to use IntRange instead of IntStream if you can get the same functionality from it.
